metadata.name: Suspicious Files in Default GPO Folder
metadata.comment: Detects the creation of copy of suspicious files (EXE/DLL) to the default GPO storage folder

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM file_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND contains(lower(file.path), lower('\\policies\\{31b2f340-016d-11d2-945f-00c04fb984f9}\\')) AND (endswith(lower(file.path), lower('.dll')) OR endswith(lower(file.path), lower('.exe'))))

output.summary: Detects the creation of copy of suspicious files (EXE/DLL) to the default GPO storage folder
